comments.raw_text:
This is valuable for people who want to examine the MIME structure of a message, but not spend a lot of time downloading and processing the message: people who want to examine headers, figure out if there are any attachments, etc. Ideally, this should be reflected as an option for the MsgHdrToMimeMessage API, so that consumers have more control over how the message is streamed.

This is a followup to bug 648972
comments.creator: jonathan.protzenko@gmail.com
